properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 3 at 3:41AM EST until January 5 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt
possible.

* WHERE...Edisto Beach to Savannah out 20 NM and Savannah to
Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT
